name: Inferno (itch) (max78games)
description:
Demo version 01/01/2023 for PC

ITALIANO

Un giorno un troll mentre era a caccia di topi ad un certo punto cade nei meandri  del vulcano presente in quella zona, solo dopo scopre di essere all'inferno!!! Aiuta quindi il troll a sopravvivere e a  trovare la via di fuga per tornare in superficie!

ENGLISH

One day a troll while he was hunting for mice at one point falls into the meanders of the volcano in that area, only after he discovers he's in hell!!! Then help the troll survive and find his way back to the surface!

With every second of the game the life bar decreases.

Collect the purple magic gem to cancel the decrease of the health bar when it is very low.

Collect fruit so your life bar increases
